attributes.action: Re-evaluate the punishments for convicted rapists and paedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just watched a programmed on how convicted paedophiles want to be treated like equals and I was physically sick. I feel we should be doing more to protect the children of this country and punish all paedophiles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
